function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to cuprous oxide as a pesticide and marine antifoulant","Impact":"Potential adverse effects on human health and marine organisms","Mitigation":"Use alternative eco-friendly pesticides and antifoulants, study the long-term effects of exposure to cuprous oxide","Technologies":"Develop and use non-toxic pesticides and antifoulants, conduct comprehensive environmental impact studies","People":"Farmers, pesticide applicators, marine life, general population near marine areas","Owner":"Environmental agencies, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of systemic toxicity associated with copper exposure","Impact":"Misunderstanding of risks and lack of awareness of potential health effects","Mitigation":"Conduct further research on the systemic effects of copper exposure, public education on potential health risks","Technologies":"Clinical and environmental toxicology studies, public health education campaigns","People":"General population, healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Inactivation of SARS-CoV-2 using Cu 2 O particles bound into a film","Impact":"Potential impact on the spread and control of COVID-19, public health implications","Mitigation":"Further research on the effectiveness and safety of Cu 2 O particle coatings, regulatory scrutiny of the application of Cu 2 O in public spaces","Technologies":"Virology research, public health surveillance systems, regulatory frameworks for antiviral materials","People":"General population, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions, regulatory bodies"}]}
